duchess.GUI

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component

          • duchess.GUI.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class Board
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    Represents the chessboard visually.
    See Also:

      • query

        public void query(VSquare vsq)
        Queries squares on the board. If the square is occupied, it shows possible moves. If not, it shows who can move there.
        Parameters:
        vsq - VSquare

      • movePiece

        public void movePiece(VSquare vsq)
        GUI equivalent to move() in logic. Decides what do after each click sequence.
        Parameters:
        vsq - VSquare clicked.
